class blockchaininterface.BlockchainInterface[source]¶

Bases: object

add_tx_notify(txd, unconfirmfun, confirmfun, notifyaddr)[source]¶

Invokes unconfirmfun and confirmfun when tx is seen on the network

pushtx(txhex)[source]¶

pushes tx to the network, returns txhash, or None if failed

query_utxo_set(txouts)[source]¶

takes a utxo or a list of utxos returns None if they are spend or unconfirmed otherwise returns value in satoshis, address and output script

sync_addresses(wallet)[source]¶

Finds which addresses have been used and sets wallet.index appropriately

sync_unspent(wallet)[source]¶

Finds the unspent transaction outputs belonging to this wallet, sets wallet.unspent

sync_wallet(wallet)[source]¶

class blockchaininterface.CliJsonRpc(cli, testnet)[source]¶

Bases: object

Fake JsonRpc class that uses the Bitcoin CLI executable. This is used as temporary fall back before we switch completely (and exclusively) to the real JSON-RPC interface.

get_received_by_addr(addresses, query_params)[source]¶
grab_coins(receiving_addr, amt=50)[source]¶

NOTE! amt is passed in Coins, not Satoshis! Special method for regtest only: take coins from bitcoind’s own wallet and put them in the receiving addr. Return the txid.
